message:
I figured out how to enable async / await within the context of the $q scheduler in angularjs.  
it makes for very neat code right now, with angular and typescript. For anyone keen to see how it works: [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41094882/typescript-2-1-with-async-await-generating-es5-es3-target-for-angularjs](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41094882/typescript-2-1-with-async-await-generating-es5-es3-target-for-angularjs)
